comment: I really enjoyed my time at Harvard University. The professors were engaging and the campus atmosphere was lively.
MIT exceeded my expectations in every way. The facilities were top-notch and the faculty was incredibly supportive.
Stanford University had its ups and downs. While some professors were excellent, others seemed disinterested.
I had a terrible experience at Caltech. The administration was unresponsive and the facilities were outdated.
Yale University provided a great learning environment. The campus was beautiful and the courses were challenging.
